mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT * FROM( SELECT M_NAME, PLAN_NAME FROM PARTY P JOIN MEMBER_PARTY Y ON(P.P_NO = Y.P_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.M_NO=Y.M_NO) JOIN OTT_INFO O ON(O.OTT_NO = P.OTT_NO) WHERE M.M_ID = #{memberid} ) ORDER BY M_NAME
SELECT ROWNUM ,M.* FROM ( SELECT M_NAME,M_ID, M_JOINDATE, M_AUTHORITY, M_POINT,m_status FROM MEMBER ORDER BY M_NAME) M
SELECT OTT_NO, OTT_NAME,OTT_CLASS, OTT_MAX_MEMBER,PLAN_NAME, PLAN_PRICE, OTT_THUMB FROM OTT_INFO
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE WHERE N_STATUS = 'Y'
select * from( SELECT O.OTT_NAME ,COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM PARTY P JOIN OTT_INFO O ON(O.OTT_NO = P.OTT_NO) GROUP BY O.OTT_NAME ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 4
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE M_JOINDATE < TO_DATE(20220228)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE M_JOINDATE < TO_DATE(20220531)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE M_JOINDATE < TO_DATE(20220831)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE M_JOINDATE < TO_DATE(20221031)

SELECT ROWNUM, N.* FROM ( SELECT N_NO, N_TITLE, M.M_NAME, N_CREATE_DATE, N_READCOUNT
FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER M ON(N.N_M_NO = M.M_NO) WHERE N_STATUS = 'Y' ) N ORDER BY N_NO DESC
SELECT ROWNUM, Q.* FROM ( SELECT Q_NO, Q_TITLE, M.M_NAME, Q_ENROLLDATE, Q_STATUS FROM QUESTION Q JOIN MEMBER M ON(Q.Q_M_NO = M.M_NO) ORDER BY Q_STATUS ) Q

SELECT ROWNUM, N.* FROM ( SELECT N_NO, N_TITLE, N_CONTENT, M.M_NAME, N_CREATE_DATE, N_PATH, N_READCOUNT FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER M ON(N.N_M_NO = M.M_NO) WHERE N_STATUS = 'Y' AND N_NO = #{page} ) N ORDER BY N_NO
SELECT ROWNUM, Q.* FROM ( SELECT Q_NO, Q_TITLE, Q_CONTENT, M.M_NAME, Q_ENROLLDATE, Q_STATUS FROM QUESTION Q JOIN MEMBER M ON(Q.Q_M_NO = M.M_NO) WHERE Q_NO =#{no} ) Q
SELECT A_NO,A_TITLE, A_DATE,A_CONTENT,M.M_NAME FROM ANSWER A JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.M_NO=A.A_M_NO) WHERE Q_NO = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE( N_NO, N_TITLE, N_CONTENT, N_PATH, N_M_NO) VALUES( SEQ_NOTICE.NEXTVAL, #{n_title}, #{n_content}, #{n_path}, #{n_M_No} )
INSERT INTO QUESTION( Q_NO, Q_TITLE, Q_CONTENT, Q_ENROLLDATE, Q_M_NO) VALUES(SEQ_QUESTIONS.NEXTVAL, #{q_title}, #{q_content}, #{q_M_no}, 12)

INSERT INTO OTT_INFO(OTT_NO, OTT_NAME, OTT_CLASS, OTT_MAX_MEMBER, PLAN_NAME, PLAN_PRICE, OTT_THUMB )VALUES(SEQ_OTT_NO.NEXTVAL, #{ott_name}, #{ott_class}, #{ott_max_member}, #{plan_name}, #{plan_price}, #{ott_thumb} )
INSERT INTO ANSWER( A_NO, A_TITLE, A_CONTENT, A_DATE, A_M_NO, Q_NO) VALUES( SEQ_ANSWER.NEXTVAL, #{a_title}, #{a_content}, SYSDATE, #{a_m_no}, #{q_no})
mapper.update: UPDATE QUESTION SET Q_TITLE = #{q_title}, Q_CONTENT = #{q_content}, Q_ENROLLDATE = SYSDATE WHERE Q_NO = #{q_no}
